lines.text: Take your dead and git. And don't bury 'em on my ground!
How do you make your livin'?
Well, uh... I count money at the bank.
What do you do for a living, Riley?
Well, I guess I got a lot to learn... not from you.

[to Riley]
Man calls me a liar - I'll kill 'em! You're not a man. You're a boy!
If he wants to hate me, let him. What I'm trying to do is stand him on his own two feet.
